entry.title: Lynch - Instant Chicken Gravy Mix - 5.45 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 44.99

Lynch - Instant Chicken Gravy Mix - 12 Lbs

Yield 54 L
Serving Size 60 ML
Servings 900
   
SCC 00062802661018
Gross Weight 13.3 lbs / 6 kgs
Case Dimensions (LxWxH) 24 x 24 x 21 CM
Case Cube (mᶾ, ftᶾ) 0.01 / 0.43
Pallet Tie / Tier 20 / 5
Shelf Life 540 Days

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Our instant sauces are easy to prepare, full of flavour and come in many different varieties.

USE IDEAS

Use to prepare gravies for your favourite meat and side dishes. Ideal for poultry sandwiches, poultry dishes and French fries.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Add 1 lb (454 g) of gravy base to 4.5 L (1 Imperial gallon) cold water. Bring to a boil and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring continuously.

INGREDIENTS

 

Wheat flour, modified corn starch, hydrolyzed soy and corn protein, chicken fat, vegetable oil shortening (palm oil, soybean oil & modified palm oil), monosodium glutamate, sugar, salt, caramel (contains sulphites), maltodextrin, onion powder, glucose solids, spice extractives (contains soy lecithin) & spices (contains mustard), flavour, parsley, garlic powder, sunflower oil.

entry.title: Lynch - Instant Beef Gravy Mix - 12 Lbs
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 69.99

Lynch -  Instant Beef Gravy Mix - 5.45 Kg

﻿

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Our cooked gravies and sauces offer rich homemade flavours and come in many different varieties.

USE IDEAS

Use to prepare gravies for your favourite meat and side dishes. Ideal for beef sandwiches, meatloaf and French fries.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

Melt 2 cups (340 g) fat. Add 2 cups (284 g) of flour, stirring until smooth. Dissolve 2/3 cup (91 g)of base into 160 fl oz (4.5L) boiling water. Slowly add to fat-flour micture, stirring. Bring back to boil and allow to simmer until thick.

INGREDIENTS

 

Salt, dextrose & maltodextrin, hydrolyzed plant protein (soy, corn), caramel (contains sulphites), yeast extract (contains gluten), vegetable oil (canola), wheat flour, spices, flavour (contains milk), hydrogenated soy bean oil, disodium guanylate, disodium inosinate, citric acid, garlic powder.

entry.title: Lynch - Easy Way Gravy Mix - 4.54 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 54.99

Lynch -  Easy Way Gravy Mix - 10 Lb

Yield 49 L
Serving Size 60 ML
Servings 816
   
SCC 00062802660417
Gross Weight 11.3 lbs / 5.1 kgs
Case Dimensions (LxWxH) 24 x 24 x 21 CM
Case Cube (mᶾ, ftᶾ) 0.01 / 0.43
Pallet Tie / Tier 20 / 5
Shelf Life 540 Days

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Our cooked gravies and sauces offer rich homemade flavours and come in many different varieties.

USE IDEAS

Use to prepare gravies for your favourite meat and side dishes. Ideal for beef sandwiches, meatloaf and French fries.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

To 1 gallon (4.54 L) cold water, add 15 oz (425 g) (by weight) of gravy mix (3 to 3 1/2 cups powder to 1 gallon cold water). Bring to a boil, stirring continuously. Simmer for 3 minutes.

INGREDIENTS

 

Corn starch, wheat flour (contains gluten), hydrolyzed plant protein (soy, corn,canola), palm oil, soybean oil and modified palm oil, caramel (contains sulphites), salt, monosodium glutamate, onion powder, guar gum, xanthan gum, flavour, spice extractive (contains soy lecithin), sunflower oil.

entry.title: Donmar - Beef Gravy Mix - 4.54 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Donmar
Type: FOOD
Price: 39.99

Donmar - Beef Gravy Mix - 4.54 Kg

Making large batches of gravy. It can be prepared either instantly or in an easy two-step stove top method. Both perform equally as well, bringing out a hearty, savory gravy taste in minutes!

Whether you're preparing traditional country-style favorites like Shepherd's pie or new culinary creations, this beef-flavored gravy is a perfect complement to main entrees and side dishes! You can even customize it and add your favorite ingredients. Its smooth, creamy consistency and savory taste naturally enhances beef, hamburgers, sausage, chicken fried steak, and pot pies.

Pour this rich gravy over meats and serve with mashed potatoes and stuffing. Or, use it as a savory ingredient to create signature sauces for pasta noodles. Featuring a nice peppery taste that's not too salty, this beef gravy makes a versatile and convenient addition to any kitchen!

entry.title: Lynch - Beef Gravy Base - 5.45 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lynch
Type: FOOD
Price: 79.99

Lynch -  Beef Gravy Base - 5.45 Kg

Making large batches of gravy. It can be prepared either instantly or in an easy two-step stove top method. Both perform equally as well, bringing out a hearty, savory gravy taste in minutes!

Whether you're preparing traditional country-style favorites like Shepherd's pie or new culinary creations, this beef-flavored gravy is a perfect complement to main entrees and side dishes! You can even customize it and add your favorite ingredients. Its smooth, creamy consistency and savory taste naturally enhances beef, hamburgers, sausage, chicken fried steak, and pot pies.

Pour this rich gravy over meats and serve with mashed potatoes and stuffing. Or, use it as a savory ingredient to create signature sauces for pasta noodles. Featuring a nice peppery taste that's not too salty, this beef gravy makes a versatile and convenient addition to any kitchen!

Yield 288 L
Serving Size 60 ML
Servings 4800
   
SCC 00062802660516
Gross Weight 13.3 lbs / 6 kgs
Case Dimensions (LxWxH) 24 x 24 x 21 CM
Case Cube (mᶾ, ftᶾ) 0.01 / 0.43
Pallet Tie / Tier 20 / 5
Shelf Life 540 Days

PRODUCT INFORMATION

A tasty gravy base, easily made with flour and drippings.

USE IDEAS

Use to prepare gravies for your favourite meat and side dishes. Ideal for beef sandwiches, meatloaf and French fries.

PRODUCT MAKE-UP INFORMATION

For 1 pint of gravy: melt 3 tablespoons of shortening in a sauce pan and add 5 tablespoons of flour, mix to smooth paste. Dissolve 3 teaspoons of gravy base in 20 fl oz of boiling water, then slowly add this to above paste while stirring. Stir till smooth and cook to desired consistency. Gallon batch: 3 oz of gravy base, 11 oz shortening, 9 oz flour, 1 gallon boiling water.

INGREDIENTS

 

Salt, hydrolyzed soy and corn protein, caramel (contains sulphites), monosodium glutamate, beef fat, vegetable oil shortening (palm oil, soybean oil, modified palm oil), yeast extract (contains gluten), corn syrup solids, wheat flour (gluten), hydrogenated soybean oil.

entry.title: Knorr - Chicken Noodles Soup Mix - 378 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Knorr
Type: FOOD
Price: 16.99

Knorr - Chicken Noodles Soup Mix - 378 g

Present a new soup every day with Knorr 13.3. oz. Soup du Jour chicken noodle soup mix. This soup features egg noodles, carrots, onions, celery, and chicken melded together in a well-seasoned chicken broth. Plus, it's seasoned with real sea salt and made without added MSG! Using one package per day allows you to create an ever-evolving menu with a soup of the day for your bistro, cafe, or catered event.

To prepare on a stove top, gradually whisk entire contents of bag into 1 gallon of water. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 20 minutes while stirring occasionally. The soup must reach an internal temperature of 180 degrees Fahrenheit for two minutes before serving. Each bag yields approximately 16 servings of prepared soup.

entry.title: Knorr - Harvest Tomato Vegetable Soup Mix- 334 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Knorr
Type: FOOD
Price: 17.99

Knorr - Harvest Tomato Vegetable Soup Mix- 334 g

Classic tomato broth based vegetable soup, packed with large tender vegetable pieces. Vegetarian. Delicious flavour and just 480mg of sodium per 8 oz serving. This soup is vegetarian friendly and gluten free, increasing menu options for your patrons with dietary restrictions. Plus, it is made without added MSG! Using one package per day allows you to create an ever-evolving menu with a soup of the day for your bistro, cafe, or catered event.

To prepare on a stove top, gradually whisk entire contents of bag into 1 gallon of water. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for 10 minutes while stirring occasionally. The soup must reach an internal temperature of 180 degrees Fahrenheit for two minutes before serving. Each bag yields approximately 16 servings of prepared soup.

entry.title: Donmar - Vegetable Stock Mix No Msg Kosher - 4.54 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Donmar
Type: FOOD
Price: 49.99

Donmar - Vegetable Stock Mix No Msg - 4.54 Kg

Rich in flavor, this vegetable soup base is a versatile ingredient and a delicious kitchen staple! With its delightfully savory taste and inviting aroma, it contains wholesome and flavorful ingredients. Hints of onion and garlic, savory spices, and natural flavors are combined to create this delicious and multi-purpose vegetable soup base.

This granulated blend is perfect for making your signature vegetable soups as well as enhancing vegetarian gravies and sauces with a classic flavor. Easy to prepare, it blends evenly and helps cut down on prep work, allowing you ample time to cook your dishes to perfection. Treat your customers with the homemade taste of this savory vegetable soup base!

entry.title: Donmar - Chicken Soup Base No Msg - 4.54 Kg
entry.summary:
Vendor: Donmar
Type: FOOD
Price: 29.99

Donmar - Chicken Soup Base No Msg - 4.54 Kg

﻿Whether making hearty soups or stews, or discovering new ways to enrich and enhance the flavors of your dishes, this chicken base is sure to become a staple in your kitchen. Made from freshly roasted chicken and natural juices that are concentrated with a superior blend of spices, this chicken paste base ensures a consistent, natural chicken flavor that is extremely versatile to use.

Add this base to boiling water to create an instant fully seasoned stock for homestyle chicken noodle soup, or use as a rub to marinate poultry.

You can even blend in a small amount of this base to gravies and sauces to enhance their flavor, saute with vegetables for a savory taste, and mix into mashed potatoes for a delectable melt-in-your-mouth flavor.
